heading: Finally, A Modern Content Management System
subHeading: Contentstack brings business and technology teams together to deliver personalized, omnichannel digital experiences.

whyChooseContentstack.title: Idea-to-Deployment in Record Time
whyChooseContentstack.content: Accelerate the delivery of digital content, sites, and apps to bring new experiences to life in days, not months, with a modern CMS.

whyChooseContentstack.title: Improve ROI and ‘Return on Experience’
whyChooseContentstack.content: Reap greater returns on investments – both past and future – in digital content and digital experiences.

whyChooseContentstack.title: Better Collaboration, Better Control
whyChooseContentstack.content: Bring business and technology teams into harmony with our headless CMS, and unleash the full potential of your marketers, editors, designers, and developers

forIT.title: For IT & Developers
forIT.content: Easy to maintain, front-end framework agnostic, and extensible integrations — empowering business users and freeing developers.

forBusiness.title: For Business
forBusiness.content: Build pages with a rich visual editor, along with scheduling and publishing management tools — all without developer intervention.

features.title: Workflows
features.content: Set up and define workflows and approvals with our modern CMS that map to your business processes for content management and publishing.

features.title: Experience Extensions
features.content: Easily integrate with your preferred marketing technologies (Brightcove, Marketo, Salesforce, Optimizely, etc.) without being bound to built-in preset tools.

features.title: Modular Blocks
features.content: Allow content editors to build and edit dynamic pages within our headless CMS without needing a developer's help.

features.title: Multiple Environments
features.content: Create unlimited content management system, such as development, testing, staging, and production, to map to your content production process.
